thread.title: 'A new history starts now': Korean leaders begin summit

title: 'A new history starts now': Korean leaders begin summit
text:
'A new history starts now': Korean leaders begin summit 01:32
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and South Korean President Moon Jae-in met on Friday at the heavily fortified demilitarized zone between the countries for the first summit in over ten years.
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and South Korean President Moon Jae-in met on Friday at the heavily fortified demilitarized zone between the countries for the first summit in over ten years. //in.reuters.com/video/2018/04/27/a-new-history-starts-now-korean-leaders?videoId=421613675&videoChannel=13423
